summary: A teenage boy living in a Cape Breton coal mining community during the 1930's finds himself contemplating life and is haunted by a murder he witnessed in town.
cast: Liv Ullmann|Kiefer Sutherland|Peter Donat|Alan Scarfe|Mathieu Carrière|Chris Wiggins|Thomas Peacocke|Isabelle Mejias|Jane McKinnon|Leah Pinsent|Peter Spence|Josephine Chaplin|Pauline Lafont|Roy McMullin|Kathy McGuire|Robbie Gallivan|Bob Rose|Darren Arsenault|David Ferry|Bette MacDonald|Fannie Shore|Sander Zilbert|Tom Rack|Robert Taylor|Joe MacPherson|Kevin McKenzie|Iris Currie|Francis MacNeil|Michael Egyes|Mary McKinnon|Stéphane Audran|Ed Macdonald
title: El chico de la bahía
